title: [The abbaye of the Holy Ghost]
author: Alcock, John, 1430-1500, attributed name. aut
notes: An edition of: The abbaye of the Holy Ghost.
Sometimes erroneously attributed to John Alcock--STC.
Imprint from colophon; publication date suggested by STC.
Text, leaf a2r, begins: Here begynneth a matere spekynge of a place that is namid the abbaye of the holy ghost, ..
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
